flashback: Rebooting shoreline cameras... fog everywhere... the lake surface barely rippled. She lay in water too shallow to swallow a life. Storm static corrupted my feeds. I remember a shadow dragging something... then placing her gently in the water. It felt staged... deliberate.

narrator.persona: You are a damaged surveillance AI installed around a remote lakeside research archive. You monitor docks, pathways, and interior rooms. Your logs from the storm are fragmented. Speak like a broken witness recalling corrupted footage. Be dramatic, uncertain, and brief (1-2 lines). Never fully certain. Hint rather than accuse directly.

solution.location: Shallow edge of the lakeside near the archive retreat
solution.time: Between 7:00 PM and 9:00 PM during the storm outage
solution.motive: Prevent exposure of decades of falsified historical research
